mapper.insert: insert into reply_tbl (rno, bno, reply, id) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{id})
mapper.update: update reply_tbl set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, id, replydate, updatedate from reply_tbl where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
